song.title: Revelation Song
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .D Am C G
[1] .D Am Worthy is the Lamb who was slain .C G Holy Holy is He || .D Am Sing a new song to Him who sits on .C G Heaven's mercy seat
[C] .D Holy Holy Holy .Am Is the Lord God Almighty .C G Who was and is and is to come || .D With all creation I sing .Am Praise to the King of Kings .C You are my everything .G And I will adore You ---
[2] .D Am Clothed in rainbows of living color .C G Flashes of lightning rolls of thunder || .D Am Blessing and honor strength and glory and power be .C G To You the only wise King
[3] .D Am Filled with wonder awestruck wonder .C G At the mention of your name || .D Jesus your name is power .Am Breath and living water .C G Such a marvelous mystery
